Laravel Resource Controller Diagram

During a classroom lesson that I was giving my students I started whiteboarding how the resource controllers works inside of Laravel. Also how the http verbs map to each action/method inside of that controller. After working through it I had what looked like a great diagram to share with anyone and everyone. This diagram uses a posts controller like in a blog application for example.

Laravel Resource Diagram
